title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 127.5 - Registry availability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 127.5 - Registry availability

State Regulations

The department shall update the registry as manufacturers
or contractors are added or removed. The registry shall be provided to the

Commissioner of the Office of General Services and shall be updated as
manufacturers and contractors are added to or deleted from the list. The
department shall make the registry available upon request either by hard copy
or electronically to all interested parties. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
127.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
